item.title: Implementing Autocomplete Select in Rails 6
item.description: simple-form makes creating forms that handle associations in rails a breeze. It creates a select dropdown that works really well for use cases where the number of records are few. But once the number of options in the select box gets over a certain number you would be doing your users a favor by implementing it an autocomplete box. I ran into the same situation. I had a Contact table that has_one: Panchayat relation.
